I'm thrilled to announce our next live stream, where we'll dive deep into the world of autopilot systems in various aircraft. We'll kick things off with the Cessna 172 and then explore other aircraft based on your requests.

ğŸ—“ Date: 2nd of January 2025 ğŸ•˜ Time: 15:00 CET / 02:00 NZST (next day) / 23:00 JST / 10:00 EST / 06:00 PST

What to Expect:

- In-Depth Autopilot Tutorial: Learn how to master the autopilot systems in different aircraft, starting with the Cessna 152 followed by the Boeing 737 and other aircrafts.

- Live Demonstration: Watch as we navigate and control flights using autopilot, with real-time explanations and tips.

- Q&A Session: Get your questions answered live! We'll be taking your queries and providing insights to enhance your flight sim experience.

- Community Interaction: Connect with fellow simmers, share your experiences, and learn from each other.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your flight sim skills and take your MSFS 2024 experience to new heights. Spread the word, invite your friends, and let's make this live stream an unforgettable event!
